moreBlocks.lawyersAtD'Oliveira&Associates,P.C.Selec: • Gouveia, Robin On a Super Lawyers® List

moreBlocks.articles:
• d'Oliveira & Associates opens office in Woonsocket, RI, Personal Injury Blog, November 1, 2014
    d’Oliveira & Associates’ new Woonsocket, RI Personal Injury Law Office is located at 62 Hamlet Avenue, Woonsocket, RI 02895. The move will enable the Firm to maintain closer contact with its clients in the Woonsocket, RI area.
  • Brockton Motorcycle Accident Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured in a motorcycle accident in the Brockton area, you may be entitled to a cash settlement for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.
  • Brockton Workers’ Compensation Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured while working in Brockton, you may be entitled to workers’ compensation benefits for your lost wages, medical bills, job retraining and in some cases, a lump sum settlement, among other losses.
  • Experienced MA Dog Bite Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you or a loved one has been bitten by a dog, you may be entitled to collect for your medical bills, lost wages, pain and suffering, and scarring. Many dog owners have insurance to pay these claims.
  • Brockton Slip and Fall Lawyer, d'Oliveira & Associates Website
    If you have been injured from a slip and fall accident, you may be entitled to compensation for your medical bills, lost income and pain and suffering, among other losses.

description:
Serving Accident Victims In Brockton

For the quality assistance and support you need to get the compensation and benefits you deserve after suffering an injury or loss caused by someone else's negligence, look no further than d'Oliveira & Associates P.C. From our law office in Brockton, Massachusetts, we represent innocent accident victims and disabled workers throughout Plymouth County and the areas of the South Boston metro region.

A Long History Of Success

Originally founded in 1989 by experienced attorney Paul d'Oliveira, our law firm has grown to become one of the largest legal practices in the region devoted solely to personal injury, Social Security Disability and workers' compensation law.

Having recovered over $200 million on behalf of our clients and delivering a level of service unmatched by our competitors, we have earned the respect not only of those we have served but of our peers as well. Combining our nearly 100 years of legal experience, we work hard to secure the largest settlements as quickly as possible, and our attorneys have received widespread recognition for the excellent service they provide.

We Understand Your Needs

If you were hurt or lost a loved one due to another party's negligence, or if you were injured on the job and can no longer work, you deserve to have an attorney on your side who understands what you are going through.

Devoted To Helping You Recover

At d'Oliveira & Associates P.C., we will devote all of our efforts to helping you secure the maximum amount possible for your pain and suffering, and we will remain with you throughout the process to ensure the best odds of helping you achieve the results you seek. For more information, you can contact our law firm or visit our website to receive a free initial consultation.
